tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ****** *** ** ******** *** ** *** **** ******** **** **** **** **** having been a dental patient all my life, you can really take my word for it. He gets patients from many different parts of the country, as well as overseas, especially critical cases, or situations where all other dentists have given up. Extremely brilliant with his work, which looks almost effortless thanks to his many many years of practice, it is admirable how he and his equally dedicated and friendly, and above all well skilled team work. The most important thing any patient would want is not to be treated as 'just another patient', but as a human being with real questions, concerns and apprehensions, and Dr. Girish Rao and his team know exactly how to put you at ease and help you focus on just getting better! Not to mention, the quality of work is par excellence, and pre and post care attention, impeccable. The moment I entered their clinic, I just felt rest assured that even my critical case will turn out fine. I do consider myself extremely lucky to have found such a wonderful doctor here in Bangalore. My writeup I'm sure is indicative not only of the value Dr. Girish and his team add to your treatment and recovery, but also the very genuine, human care you'll get. If you, like me, have been disappointed with other short-sighted dentists before, meeting Dr.Rao will give you hope - and prove that good doctors still exist. And he and his family, and the team also do a lot of good work even outside of this actively running practice. I'm so inspired, and feel sincere sense of gratitude to have known, above all a dedicated family of doctors who care! Heartfully recommended!

review: I went to Dr. Girish Rao for an expert opinion regarding my wisdom teeth eruption and related problems. Dr. Grirsh explaied the matter to me in detail and advised the extraction of both upper and lower wisdom teeth in the left side of my mouth. The surgery was tricky but Dr. Girish along with Dr. Swarup did it with complete precision and ease. they made sure i was experiencing the least amount of pain. The surgery was completed in 45mins. I am very grateful to Dr. Girish and would recommend everyone experiencing any dental problem to consult Dr. Girish. He and his team are experts and this field.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I had appointment for wisdom tooth extraction and root canal on the same day.. I was really worried but trust me it went really well and the doctors specially Saurabh, girish rao sir and Dr. veena did a really good job and the entire procedure went so well.. I also would like to appreciate Mohan sir (Babu) for understanding the tension I had and making sure of the time slot and doctor availability to attend me without any delay. I would for sure recommend my contacts to this clinic. Also they have maintained the clinic so clean and u don't feel it has clinic at all. Thank you all the staff much appreciated üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have a rare jaw bone condition, the doctor was kind and patient enough to explain the criticality of the problem pretty well that even a layman like me could make sense of. When a person usually understands about his problem well will usually solve most of the concerns from patients perspective, enabling him/her to plan the further procedures. It is very rare that a doctor sits with his patient calmly and explain their problem and the criticality of the issue. This awareness is a must for any patient.
